code: import React from'react';import'./CategoryFilter.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CategoryFilter=_ref=>{let{selectedCategory,onCategoryChange,rules}=_ref;const categories=['all',...new Set(rules.map(rule=>rule.category))].sort();const getCategoryCount=category=>{if(category==='all')return rules.length;return rules.filter(rule=>rule.category===category).length;};const getCategoryColor=category=>{const colors={aws:'#ff9900',python:'#3776ab',terraform:'#623ce4',javascript:'#f7df1e',react:'#61dafb',ruby:'#cc342d',serverless:'#fd5750'};return colors[category]||'#00ff41';};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"category-filter",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"filter-label",children:"Category:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"category-buttons",children:categories.map(category=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:()=>onCategoryChange(category),className:`category-button ${selectedCategory===category?'active':''}`,style:{'--category-color':category!=='all'?getCategoryColor(category):'#00ff41'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"category-name",children:category==='all'?'All':category.charAt(0).toUpperCase()+category.slice(1)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"category-count",children:getCategoryCount(category)})]},category))})]});};export default CategoryFilter;
